name: OurPlace120

attributes.type:
literal_string "Welcome to ourPlace! 
 
 Here you can change a pixel to any color on the Hex #RRGGBB scale for a small fee. 
 Below you will find the general *rules* of the contract and other terms and conditions written in plain English. 
 
 We highly suggest you give it a quick read, enjoy!"
attributes.value:
Welcome to ourPlace! 
 
 Here you can change a pixel to any color on the Hex #RRGGBB scale for a small fee. 
 Below you will find the general *rules* of the contract and other terms and conditions written in plain English. 
 
 We highly suggest you give it a quick read, enjoy!

attributes.type:
literal_string "The contract will only function properly if: 
 
 i)  You have not changed any other pixels on this ETH block -- only one pixel is allowed to be changed per address per block, 
 ii)  The Hex code, X & Y coordinate are valid values, 
 iii)  The transfer value is correct (this is automatically set), 
 iv)  You have accepted the Terms & Conditions. 
 
 *Please note* However unlikely, it is possible that two different people could change the same pixel in the same block. The most recently processed transaction *wins* the pixel. Allow all your pixel transactions to complete before attempting again. Order of transactions is randomly chosen by ETH miners."
attributes.value:
The contract will only function properly if: 
 
 i)  You have not changed any other pixels on this ETH block -- only one pixel is allowed to be changed per address per block, 
 ii)  The Hex code, X & Y coordinate are valid values, 
 iii)  The transfer value is correct (this is automatically set), 
 iv)  You have accepted the Terms & Conditions. 
 
 *Please note* However unlikely, it is possible that two different people could change the same pixel in the same block. The most recently processed transaction *wins* the pixel. Allow all your pixel transactions to complete before attempting again. Order of transactions is randomly chosen by ETH miners.

attributes.type:
literal_string "You should know that: 
 
 i) Changing a pixel costs ETH, 
 ii)  We make no guarantees to keep the website running forever (obviously we will do our best), 
 iii)  We may choose to permanently pause the contract, or clear large blocks of pixels if the canvas is misused, 
 iv)  We may choose to point our website to an updated, empty, contract instead of the current contract. 
 
 In addition we want to remind you: 
 
 i) To check MetaMask and clear all errors/warnings before submitting a transaction, 
 ii)You are responsible for the designs that you make, 
 iii)To be on alert for look-alike websites and malicious pop-ups, 
 iv)That you are solely responsible for the safety of your accounts."
attributes.value:
You should know that: 
 
 i) Changing a pixel costs ETH, 
 ii)  We make no guarantees to keep the website running forever (obviously we will do our best), 
 iii)  We may choose to permanently pause the contract, or clear large blocks of pixels if the canvas is misused, 
 iv)  We may choose to point our website to an updated, empty, contract instead of the current contract. 
 
 In addition we want to remind you: 
 
 i) To check MetaMask and clear all errors/warnings before submitting a transaction, 
 ii)You are responsible for the designs that you make, 
 iii)To be on alert for look-alike websites and malicious pop-ups, 
 iv)That you are solely responsible for the safety of your accounts.

attributes.type:
literal_string "Our official website will contain: 
 
 i)  A Google Tag Manager cookie with both Analytics and Adwords tags installed. Currently there is no intention to use this data for anything other than interest's sake and sharing generic aggregated data. 
 ii)  All transactions are recorded on the Ethereum blockchain, everyone has public access to this data. We, or others, may analyze this data to see which accounts interact with this contract."
attributes.value:
Our official website will contain: 
 
 i)  A Google Tag Manager cookie with both Analytics and Adwords tags installed. Currently there is no intention to use this data for anything other than interest's sake and sharing generic aggregated data. 
 ii)  All transactions are recorded on the Ethereum blockchain, everyone has public access to this data. We, or others, may analyze this data to see which accounts interact with this contract.
